message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the product for $1,000,000. This is a great deal considering its value to you. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I don't want to go any higher. What do you think?

Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still a bit far off from that price. How about we split the difference and settle on $950,000? This would give us both a fair deal. Let's close this negotiation!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with $950,000. I'm willing to go up to $920,000, but no higher. Can we meet in the middle again?

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $920,000 is still a little low for me. Let's compromise once more - I'm willing to come down to $940,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product for you.  Let's make a deal!

Hi Alice, I understand your position, but $940,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $930,000. This is my final offer, so please let me know if you're willing to accept it.
